title: Nil by mouth [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Gary Oldman, Douglas Urbanski, Luc Besson, SE8 and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
brief_description: This is a raw, unflinching look at a dysfunctional family as it copes with alcoholism, drug abuse, petty crime and domestic violence in South East London. Gary Oldman’s brilliantly written screen-play and stunning direction perfectly capture the solidarity, resilience and humour that make survival possible.
